examples: The mother can use massage/compression to increase the flow of milk, which will stimulate the baby to nurse actively again. This works especially well with premies, babies with Down syndrome, and other babies who are weak.

entries.meaning: A follower of the controversial spiritual leader Prem Rawat (born 1957).
examples: Armed with the knowledge of his own private God, a premie should be able, according to the guru, to handle any situation with maturity  […]
